class.name: GDScript
class.brief_description: A script implemented in the GDScript programming language.
class.description: A script implemented in the GDScript programming language, saved with the [code].gd[/code] extension. The script extends the functionality of all objects that instantiate it. Calling [method new] creates a new instance of the script. [method Object.set_script] extends an existing object, if that object's class matches one of the script's base classes. If you are looking for GDScript's built-in functions, see [@GDScript] instead.

method.name: new
